acts.name: Sniffing attack
acts.desc: obtain rival's username and password, as well as other data, if the rival's network communication is not encrypted or hashed.

acts.name: MITM
acts.desc: Performe a Man-In-The-Midele attack. If no authentication of any kind, give the buff "MITM".

acts.name: Quantum computing
acts.desc: Crack DH, MQV and RSA key exchange, but not Quantum cryptography

acts.name: Replay attack
acts.desc: replay the last message, effective even if encrypted. Countered by the use of nonce, timestamp, and relieved by sequence number

acts.name: Spam email
acts.desc: Send spam email to overload the rival's mailbox.

acts.name: DH
acts.desc: One method to exchange share secret between two parties, so that the message can be encrypted. Defend from sniffing attack, but will be fooled by MITM attack.

acts.name: MQV
acts.desc: The scured DH. Resistent to MITM attack, but requires PKI.

acts.name: RSA key exchange
acts.desc: Another method for key exchange, based RSA. Resistent to MITM, but requires PKI

acts.name: Nonce
acts.desc: A random number used to fight Replay attack.

acts.name: Greylisting
acts.desc: A method to fight spam email by delaying email messages. It has an unkeep, due to the delay of legitimate email.

acts.name: Quantum cryptography
acts.desc: Use quantum mechanics for cryptography. Unbreakable.

buffs.name: Shared secret
buffs.desc: The server and it client have built a secure connection, with a encryption key shared by both sides, and unknown by others. Sniffing is not possible.

buffs.name: MQV
buffs.desc: An advanced version of DH. With the use of digital certificates, Man-in-the-middle attack is not possible.

buffs.name: RSA key exchange
buffs.desc: Another way to exchange encryption key. Resistent to MITM attack, but weak against Quantum computing.

buffs.name: Nonce
buffs.desc: A random number used to fight Replay attack.

buffs.name: Greylisting
buffs.desc: A method to fight spam email by delaying email messages. It has an unkeep, due to the delay of legitimate email.

buffs.name: Quantum cryptography
buffs.desc: Use quantum mechanics for cryptography. Unbreakable.

dialogues.name: Calvin
dialogues.dialogue: Fabulous! We have successfully built a quantum computer. You can now use it against any encryption. ^Meanwhile, quantum cryptography is the adversary to quantum computer. Be aware!
